permissions: User must be authorized to view the referenced invoice (invoice policy show? permission).
side_effects: Queues an asynchronous invoice PDF email delivery.
validation_notes: --invoice is required and must reference an existing invoice. --email-address is required and must be a valid email address (strict validation with FQDN required).

flags.name: --email-address
flags.validation: Required; must be a valid email address (strict, FQDN required). Example: ap@example.com.
